SqlQuery.QUERY: SELECT RECNUM, INCIDENT_NUM, OCCURRED_ON, OCCURRED_TO, REPORTED_ON, DISP_CODE, DISP_DATE, STATT, STATUS_DATE, AGENCY_REC, CREATED_ON, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_ON, UPDATED_BY FROM WEBRMS.DBO.INCIDENT WHERE RECNUM IN (##INCIRECS##)
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.INCIDENT_OFFENSE WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##)
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.INCIDENT_PROPERTY WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##)
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.PROPERTY_FILE_ITEMS WHERE RECNUM IN (SELECT PROP_REC FROM WEBRMS.DBO.INCIDENT_PROPERTY WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##))
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.LINKVC WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##)
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.MASTAUTO WHERE RECNUM IN (SELECT VEH_REC FROM WEBRMS.DBO.LINKVC WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##))
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.LINK WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##)
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.INCIDENT_NAME_OFFENSE_LINK WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##)
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.INCIDENT_LEOKA WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##)
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.VICTIM_SUSPECT WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##)
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.LINKCA WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##)
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.ARRESTS WHERE RECNUM IN (SELECT ARST_REC FROM WEBRMS.DBO.LINKCA WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##))
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.ARSTCHRG WHERE RECNUM IN (SELECT ARST_REC FROM WEBRMS.DBO.LINKCA WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##))
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.ARSTWEAP WHERE RECNUM IN (SELECT ARST_REC FROM WEBRMS.DBO.LINKCA WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##))
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.LINKCJC WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##)
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.JUVENILE_CONTACTS WHERE RECNUM IN (SELECT JC_REC FROM WEBRMS.DBO.LINKCJC WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##))
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.JUVENILECHRG WHERE RECNUM IN (SELECT JC_REC FROM WEBRMS.DBO.LINKCJC WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##))
SELECT * FROM WEBRMS.DBO.JUVWEAP WHERE RECNUM IN (SELECT JC_REC FROM WEBRMS.DBO.LINKCJC WHERE INCIDENT_REC IN (##INCIRECS##))
SELECT RECNUM, NIB_CODE, NIB_CLASS, CLASS, TYPE, CODE, NAME, AGENCY_REC FROM WEBRMS.DBO.MASTCODE
SELECT RECNUM, LNAME, FNAME, MIDDLE, NAME_TYPE, DOB, SEX, RACE, ETHNIC FROM WEBRMS.DBO.MASTNAME
SELECT RECNUM, NIB_CODE, CODE, NAME, AGENCY_REC FROM WEBRMS.DBO.STATUTE_CODE
